secondaries.shortDescription: End of turn, if 2 Acts of faith were performed by ADEPTAS SORTITAS units, score 1 VP if it's your turn, 2 if it's opponents. With 3 acts, score 1 more.

subObjectives.description: You made 2 acts of faith during your turn
You made 2 acts of faith during your ENEMY turn
You made 3 acts of faith during any turn

secondaries.shortDescription: End of Shooting phase score 1 if 1+ enemy unit was destroyed with a bold weapon OR a flame weapon OR a melta weapon by a ADEPTUS MINISTORUM. If all of these apply, score 1 more.

subObjectives.description: You destroyed an ENEMY unit with an attach by an ADEPTUS MINITORUM using a bolt weapon
You destroyed an ENEMY unit with an attach by an ADEPTUS MINITORUM using a flame weapon
You destroyed an ENEMY unit with an attach by an ADEPTUS MINITORUM using a melta weapon
You did all of the above

secondaries.shortDescription: ADEPTA SORITAS INFANTRY and CULT IMPERIALIS PRIEST can attempt a Sacred Grounds action. Score 1 if the objective was wholly within your deployment zone, otherwise score 4
secondaries.scoringPhase: Command phase or end of battle

subObjectives.description: ONCE PER OBJECTIVE Consecrate ground action has been completed wholly inside of your deployment zone objective
ONCE PER OBJECTIVE Consecrate ground action has been completed outside of your deployment zone objective

secondaries.shortDescription: Opponent select one objective marker not within their own deployment zone to be the sacred shrine. End of Turn : Score 3 if controlling it, score 3 more at the end of battle if constrolling it. But -3 if the opponent has it
secondaries.scoringPhase: End of Turn, End of Game

subObjectives.description: You Control the Sacred Shrine at the end of your turn or end of game
Your enemy Control the Sacred Shrine at the end of the game
